snippet: Etsy’s quarterly loss doubled because of higher marketing expenses, which the company said would only increase in the current quarter.
abstract: Etsy Inc reports second-quarter net loss of $6.4 million, as compared to loss of $3.2 million in year-earlier period; revenue rose 44.4 percent to $61.4 million, but results send shares down more than 15 percent.
lead_paragraph: Etsy’s quarterly loss doubled because of higher marketing expenses, which the company said would only increase in the current quarter.

headline.main: High Costs Offset an Increase in Revenue at Etsy Inc.
headline.print_headline: High Costs Offset an Increase in Revenue at Etsy Inc.
